攐字的基本解释

攐
qiān
古同“褰”，把衣服撩起。
缩。
古同“攑”，举。

攐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiān］
［《廣韻》去乾切，平仙，溪。］
同“褰1”。
用手提起衣裳。

攐字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　攐； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页462第39
【唐韻】去虔切【集韻】【韻會】丘虔切，?音愆。【說文】摳衣也。○按《詩》：褰裳涉溱。从褰爲正。　又【集韻】丘言切，音㨜。義同。

攐字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
攐字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Scratch
qiān
Gu Tong "Chen" lifted up his clothes.
Shrink.
Gu Tong "snap", lift.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiān］
["Guangyun" Go to dry cutting, Pingxian, Xi. ]
Same as "褰1".
Lift the clothes by hand.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　攐; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 462 Page 39
【Tang Yun】Go to Qianqian【Jiyun】【Yunhui】Qiu Qianqie, sound stunned. [Said Wen] Picking clothes. ○According to "Poetry": Yin Chang and Qin. From 褰 to positive.　 [Ji Yun] Qiu Yan cut, sound 㨜. The same meaning.
